description:
misc/goplay: use `go run x.go` instead of `go build x.go`

when the program is not main package, `go run x.go` can't return the
link error message. so use `go run x.go` in instead `go build x.go`.

Fixes issue 5865.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
http://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=26f441a1f78b ***

misc/goplay: use `go run x.go` instead of `go build x.go`

when the program is not main package, `go run x.go` can't return the
link error message. so use `go run x.go` in instead `go build x.go`.

Fixes issue 5865.

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/11165043

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

subject: code review 11165043: misc/goplay: use `go run x.go` instead of `go build x.go`
